actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-723.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to amend section 574 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the Administrative Conference of the United States to provide assistance in response to requests relating to the improvement of administrative procedure in foreign countries.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrative Conference of the United States to provide assistance, on a fully reimbursable basis, in response to requests relating to the improvement of adminstrative procedure in foreign countries.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 574 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the Administrative Conference of the United States to provide assistance in response to requests relating to the improvement of administrative procedure in foreign countries.
